title: SUPERSAIAN
author: SUPERSAIAN
content: NT Rugs Since 1941 A rug is a type of moveable floor covering, typically made from woven material. Rug-makers can make these coverings from various materials using a range of different methods. There are natural fiber rugs, like wool, silk, or jute rugs, and synthetic fiber rugs, like polyester and stain-resistant olefin rugs. Some rugs feature a combination of natural and synthetic fibers, like blending silk with viscose to increase durability. The material of a rug can affect price, durability, design, and feeling. As NT carpet, we ship to all over the world. We provide this service free of charge. If you want to add a new ambiance to your home and you want your carpets to be handcrafted, you can get them from NT carpet store, you can ask me for a catalog without hesitation and I will help you. The carpets you buy will always keep their value, as an extra, don't forget that.For those, who is interested with collection carpets, we have more special carpets in our portfolio.We accept Bitcoin payment.You can suggest a name for Escrow if we have a deal.Contact will be updated from TelegramYou can PM for now.

comments.author: EFS
comments.body: Send me one so I can make a review!   Jokes aside, I know their rugs. They all look like high quality. Türkiye is known for these types of rugs, tourists love them.You might want to add a photo album to show more options.

comments.author: meser#
comments.body: Rugs, Carpets and kilims... It might be seen as a overrated cultural items but its amazing part of our culture. If I wasn't wrong our people are using double knot technique different than others like indians and persians and also it gives extra durabilty against vacuum cleaner. And Turkish rugs and carpets can be easily cleans unless if you're not too dirty  @SUPERSAIAN It will be better publishing catalogue. They can see what kind of masterpieces you have
